results.title: Steering, wheels, front and rear axles
results.creator_credit: United States. Army. Office of Education
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Automotive Operation and Maintenance”.
How to check for play in the steering wheel and the front end assembly; correct wheel run-out; make a test; test springs, axles and overall back-lash.
results.description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Automotive Operation and Maintenance”.
How to check for play in the steering wheel and the front end assembly; correct wheel run-out; make a test; test springs, axles and overall back-lash.
description_for_label:

results.title: Clutch and handbrake
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Automotive Operation and Maintenance”.
How to determine and correct the amount of clutch pedal clearance or “lash”, check clutch for slipping, grabbing or drag; how to inspect and adjust the hand brake.

results.title: Introduction to preventive maintenance
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Automotive Operation and Maintenance”.
Shows the importance of preventive maintenance in truck operation and illustrates a typical preventive maintenance check as applied to the clutch pedal, the battery and the voltage regulator.
results.description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Automotive Operation and Maintenance”.

results.title: Know your car
results.creator_credit: F.E. Brooker, Jam Handy and United States. Office of Education
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Automotive Operation and Maintenance”.
An instructional training film for students or drivers, presenting a simple exposiiton of the physical principles and mechanics of a car - suspension, steering, fuel combustion, clutch, gears, brakes etc.

results.title: Periodic check-up
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Automotive Operation and Maintenance”.
The necessary steps in the periodic check-up of a car. Including the brake system, inspecting the steering systems and inspecting chasses and body.

results.title: Engine tests and tune-up
results.creator_credit: Gene K Walker and United States. Office of Education
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “Automobile Maintenance”.
How to adjust the automatic choke; check and adjust ignition, valve tappets, and carburettor; make vacuum gauge tests; and test vacuum brake system.

results.title: The Cooling system and fuel system
results.creator_credit: United States. Office of Education. Division of Visual Aids
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Automobile Maintenance”.
Demonstrates how to check for leaks in the cooling system; check the fan and water pump; mechanical operation of the carburettor; filters and vents; and fuel pumps.

results.title: The Hydraulic brake system
results.creator_credit: Century Productions and United States. Office of Education
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Automobile Maintenance”.
Illustrates how to check brake pedal travel; examine the brake lining; adjust thebrake shoes; inspect shoes; inspect and adjust the hydraulic fluid system - taking care of minor problems prevents major problems.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Century Productions and United States. Office of Education
results.description:

results.title: Engine assembly
results.creator_credit: Gene K Walker and United States. Office of Education
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Automobile Maintenance”.
Shows how to check the cylinder head and block; intake and exhaust manifolds; under-chassis parts; valve mechanism and tappets; vents, screws and air filters; oil filter and oil lines; and cylinder depression.
